name: Mercury (itch)
description:
Created by Dylan Wong, Spring 2020

The year is 5048 and San Francisco looks like an inside of a car because the government attempted to remodel all the buildings.  Unfortunately, a giant bird killed everyone before they were able to finish remodeling the entire city thus why there are holes in the buildings.  The ferret wakes up from a 635 year hibernation and sees a sheep. The ferret follows the sheep because the sheep is leading the ferret to the cause  and stopping it.
